story.title: Our Story
content: Mark Repair Services was founded with a simple goal: to provide homeowners with reliable, high-quality home repair and maintenance services they can trust.

What started as a small local operation has grown into a comprehensive home services company serving communities across Texas and Florida. Our growth is built on a foundation of satisfied customers and word-of-mouth recommendations.

Today, we employ over 50 skilled technicians and have completed more than 10,000 projects. But we haven't forgotten our roots â€“ every customer receives the same personalized attention and quality service that built our reputation.
